name: anor

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wn(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
-| wb(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wn(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
-| wb(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wn(wo(wn(w0), wn(w1))))
-| wb(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wo(wn(w0), wn(w1)))

comment: Conjunction in terms of disjunction (De Morgan's law). Theorem *4.5 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Nov-2012.)
